Quote: If someone would have talked in school about safe touch and unsafe touch, I believe I would have spoken up as a child and not been victimized over and over again for years, but that day never came, which is why my mission now is to protect children from the childhood I could not be protected from.
Author: Erin Merryn,  An Unimaginable Act: Overcoming and Preventing Child Abuse Through Erin's Law
